welcome_benefits: 5,000 EDGE Reward Points (Worth ₹1,000) on Spending ₹1,000 or More Within the First Month of Card Issuance

Movie & Dining: 30% off on Swiggy orders and a 15% discount at various partner restaurants with the Dining Delights Program
Rewards Rate: 10X EDGE Points/₹125 Spent at Departmental and Apparel Stores. 2 EDGE Points/₹125 on All Eligible Spends.
Reward Redemption: Reward Points Can be Redeemed for Vouchers, Products, and More. 1 EDGE Reward Point = ₹0.20
Domestic Lounge Access: 2 Free Visits Each Quarter (On Spends of ₹50,000 or More in the Last Quarter)
Insurance Benefits: Rs. 1 Lakh purchase protection cover and cover for loss of travel documents and baggage

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Renewal fee is waived off on spending Rs. 2 Lakhs or more in the card anniversary year
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% Waiver on Fuel Transactions Between ₹400 and ₹5,000. Maximum ₹400 Each Statement Cycle
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the Amount Withdrawn or ₹500, Whichever is Higher

product_details: Welcome benefit of 5000 EDGE reward points
2 EDGE reward points on every send of Rs. 125
10x EDGE reward points on every spend of Rs. 125 on departmental and apparel stores
Membership benefits worth Rs. 1000 per card anniversary year
30% off on Swiggy orders and 15% off at partner restaurants with the Dining Delights Program
2 complimentary domestic airport lounge access per quarter
1% fuel surcharge waiver with a maximum benefit of Rs. 400 every statement cycle
1 Lakh purchase protection cover and cover for loss of travel documents and baggage
